name: deviantArt Eclipse Redesign
description: Eclipse Redesign shall not only bring back the feeling of the old deviantart, but also help your orientation by making the general appearance smaller and add more colours as separators.
additional_info:
This is just a small overview, take a look at the journal to find all changes: https://www.deviantart.com/isi-daddy/journal/Eclipse-Redesign-Update-4th-January-21-839089048


Changes:
- notification page: 
* comments in the look of the old dA
* changed appearance for group stacks of messages and activity feed
* "Original" shows prior message

- watch page:
* thumbs for deviations, status, journal and commissions have been made smaller

- other
* journals have been widened 
* default white background for small deviations has been removed
* shadow behind deviation has been removed
